act_fid_tips_name: EOS account name is a unique identifier of your EOS account. An EOS account corresponds to an EOS private key with different access. According to the access of the private, an account obatains corresponding account access.
act_fid_tips_password: Password is the credential to use BitPortal's functions. This password is invalid for other applications except for BitPortal. BitPortal will not store your password in any forms. If you forgot you password, please import your private key to retrieve.
act_fid_tips_invcd: Limited by the current cost of EOS account registration, BitPortal will provide registration code to a portion of users to register EOS accounts. You can participate BitPortal official event to obtain your registration code.
act_btn_title_term: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
act_fid_error_extact: Account name already exists, please use another account name.
act_fid_error_privatekey: Your private key is invalid. Please import a valid private key.
act_fid_error_pw_min_character: Password cannot be less than 6 characters.
act_fid_error_failed: Account creation failed, please try again later. If you have question, please contact us at info@bitportal.io
act_fid_error_caminv: The campaign is only available to invited users.
act_fid_error_cameos: The campaign only applies to EOS.
act_fid_error_used: Your registration code has been used.
act_fid_error_retdata: Data extraction failed, please try again later.
dlgt_popup_title_mousg: Your RAM is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
dlgt_popup_title_exlimit: Your CPU is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
import_title_tips_pwd: Password is the credential to use BitPortal's functions. This password is invalid for other applications except for BitPortal. BitPortal will not store your password in any forms. If you forgot you password, please import your private key to retrieve.
import_txtbox_txt_pwdhint1: Password cannot be less than 6 characters.
import_txtbox_txt_invalidown: Your private key is invalid. Please import a valid private key.
import_txtbox_txt_invalidactive: Your active private key is invalid. Please import a valid active private key.
ast_imp_hint_invalidowner: The private key you imported does not have the access to this action.
ast_imp_hint_eosaccount: The receiving EOS account does not exist.
import_txt_title_term: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
tra_popup_title_mousg: Your RAM is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
tra_popup_title_exlimit: Your CPU is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
snd_title_error_hinet: Your NET is insufficient to initiate the transaction. Please stake more EOS.
snd_title_error_hicpu: Your CPU is insufficient to initiate the transaction. Please stake more EOS.
carousel_one_content: A sui generis MLS system to maximize the security of usersâ€™ digital currency asset
carousel_two_content: Backed by a world-renowned blockchain conglomerate, the unionized exchange systems ensure quick and easy transactions
carousel_three_content: A dedicated customer service team provides 24/7 butler service to optimize service experience the whole time and comprehensively ehnace trading efficiency
home_partner_content: The Exchange Union has launched global trading platforms including HitBTC, OKEX, etc. and there are more to go live. Also, the union has partnered with famous media of the digital asset market such as CoinSpeaker, Cointelegraph, 8BTC, BTC123 for long-term, high-quality and stable cooperation.
browser_tip: Using this browser will impact your user experience. Please login with another browser.
bcup_sec_title_backup: Please Back Up Your Pirvate Key
bcup_sec_tips_backup: Please back up your pirvate key and keep it safely. Please do not share your private key information with others, which could result in assets loss.
asset_alert_name_err: You have not added an account. Please add an account before taking any further steps.
no_login: Please create or import an EOS account
third_party_title: You will visit the third party DApp{app}
third_party_sub: You will visit the third party DApp{app}. This page and its functions are provided directly to you by {app}. By visiting, you agree to comply with the Privacy Policy and User Agreement of the third party DApp {app}.  {app} will be directly and independently accountable to you.
abt_describe_txt_des:
BitPortal, a Portal to the Internet of Value. 
BitPortal is a well designed EOS wallet which offers faster, simpler and safer services to our users.
logout_popup_warning: Please note that all your account information will be deleted from current device once logged out. Please make sure you have backed up your wallet.
expks_hint_title_point1: Please do not share with others
expks_hint_txt_point1: Peole can access and control your account via Keystore. Please do not share your Keystore information with others, which could result in assets loss.
expks_hint_txt_point2: Please do not transfer unencrypted Keystore online. Once Keystore was hacked, your assets would be under threat.
expks_hint_txt_point3: Please store Keystore in a safe device and keep it offline when unused.
expksqrc_hint_txt_point1: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
expksqrc_txtbox_txt_content: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
expvk_hint_txt_point1: The private key has not been encrypted. Please do not share your private key information with other, which could result in assets loss.
ndst_button_name_dplnd: The node your added already exists.
vt_button_name_err: You have not added an account. Please add an account before taking any further steps.
vt_popup_title_nostaker: You need to stake EOS before voting producers.
profile_button_name_err: You have not added an account. Please add an account before taking any further steps.
scan_popup_text_invalid_image: QR code extraction failed, please try again later. Or use an image with higher clarity.
scan_popup_text_camera_disabled: Please go to system settings and allow BitPortal to use camera function.
scan_popup_text_album_disabled: Please go to system settings and allow BitPortal to use album function.
bdwidth_title_name_tip1: 1. NET is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain NET.
bdwidth_title_name_tip2: 2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
cpu_title_name_tip1: 1. CPU is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain CPU.
cpu_title_name_tip2: 2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
memory_title_name_tip1: 1. RAM is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to buy with EOS in order to obtain RAM.
memory_title_name_tip2: 2. You can buy or sell RAM anytime.
memory_title_name_tip3: 3. Trading RAM requires a fee charge of (x+199)/200, x is your trading volume.
